title: Spwig Header Preset
description: Header layout preset for Spwig v2.0 themes. Defines zone structure and widget placements for a header configuration.

name.description: Display name for this header preset

description.description: Brief description of the header layout

is_sticky.description: Whether the header sticks to the top on scroll

enable_notification_zone.description: Whether to show the announcement/notification zone above the header

zone_layouts.description: Defines which zones are active and their position slots. Each zone contains an array of position names.

top-bar.description: Optional top bar zone (announcements, contact info, etc.)

bottom-bar.description: Optional bottom bar zone (secondary navigation, breadcrumbs)

widget_placements.description: Array of widget placement definitions. Each widget is placed in a zone at a specific position and order.

zone.description: Target zone and position in format: zone-name_position (e.g., main-header_left)

order.description: Display order within the zone position (lower = first)

config.description: Widget-specific configuration (e.g., logo height, search style)
